# generate_random_string (function)

Return a random string, storing the output in state to use in subsequent runs.

## Example Usage

```terraform
output "example" {
  description = "The value of a given environment variable."
  value       = provider::utilities::get_env("GOPATH")
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
generate_random_string(length number) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `length` (Number) The length of the random string to be generated.
